mapper.select: SELECT lmc.career_no careerNo, lmc.member_id memberId, lmc.career_company_name careerCompanyName, lmc.career_start_date careerStartDate, lmc.career_end_date careerEndDate, lmc.career_leaving careerLeaving, lmc.career_reason_for_leaving careerReasonForLeaving, lmc.career_jobgrade_jobposition careerJobgradeJobposition, lmc.career_jobgrade_jobposition_year careerJobgradeJobpositionYear, lmc.job2_no job2No, lj2.job2_category job2Category, lj.job_category jobCategory, lj3.job3_category job3Category, lmc.area_no areaNo, la.area_sido areaSido, la2.area2_gungu area2Gungu, lmc.career_department careerDepartment, lmc.career_salary careerSalary, lmc.career_responsibilities careerResponsibilities, lmc.carrer_project_contents carrerProjectContents FROM linkjobs_member_career lmc INNER JOIN linkjobs_job2 lj2 ON lmc.job2_no = lj2.job2_no INNER JOIN linkjobs_job lj ON lj.job_no=lj2.job_no INNER JOIN linkjobs_job3 lj3 ON lj2.job2_no=lj3.job2_no INNER JOIN linkjobs_area la ON lmc.area_no = la.area_no INNER JOIN linkjobs_area2 la2 ON la2.area_no = la.area_no WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linkjobs_member_career( member_id, career_company_name, career_start_date, career_end_date, career_leaving, career_reason_for_leaving, career_jobgrade_jobposition, career_jobgrade_jobposition_year, job2_no, area_no, career_department, career_salary, career_responsibilities, carrer_project_contents ) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{careerCompanyName}, #{careerStartDate}, #{careerEndDate}, #{careerLeaving}, #{careerReasonForLeaving}, #{careerJobgradeJobposition}, #{careerJobgradeJobpositionYear}, #{job2No}, #{areaNo}, #{careerDepartment}, #{careerSalary}, #{careerResponsibilities}, #{carrerProjectContents} )
